configMap.description: `ConfigMap` is a convenient way to specify a function config of kind ConfigMap.

configPath.description:
`ConfigPath` specifies a slash-delimited relative path to a file in the current directory
containing a KRM resource used as the function config. This resource is
excluded when resolving 'sources', and as a result cannot be operated on
by the pipeline.

image.description:
`Image` specifies the function container image.
It can either be fully qualified, e.g.:

image: gcr.io/kpt-fn/set-labels

Optionally, kpt can be configured to use a image
registry host-path that will be used to resolve the image path in case
the image path is missing (Defaults to gcr.io/kpt-fn).
e.g. The following resolves to gcr.io/kpt-fn/set-labels:

image: set-labels

selectors.description:
`Selectors` are used to specify resources on which the function should be executed
if not specified, all resources are selected

Git.title: Git is the user-specified locator for a package on Git.

directory.description:
Directory is the sub directory of the git repository.
e.g. 'staging/cockroachdb'

ref.description: Ref can be a Git branch, tag, or a commit SHA-1.

repo.description:
Repo is the git repository the package.
e.g. 'https://github.com/kubernetes/examples.git'

GitLock.title: GitLock is the resolved locator for a package on Git.

commit.description:
Commit is the SHA-1 for the last fetch of the package.
This is set by kpt for bookkeeping purposes.

directory.description:
Directory is the sub directory of the git repository that was fetched.
e.g. 'staging/cockroachdb'

ref.description:
Ref can be a Git branch, tag, or a commit SHA-1 that was fetched.
e.g. 'master'

repo.description:
Repo is the git repository that was fetched.
e.g. 'https://github.com/kubernetes/examples.git'

Inventory.description: All of the the parameters are required if any are set.
Inventory.title: Inventory encapsulates the parameters for the inventory resource applied to a cluster.

inventoryID.description: Unique label to identify inventory resource in cluster.

name.description: Name is the metadata.name field of a Resource

namespace.description: Namespace is the metadata.namespace field of a Resource

ObjectMeta.description: ObjectMeta contains metadata about a Resource

annotations.description: Annotations is the metadata.annotations field of a Resource.

labels.description: Labels is the metadata.labels field of a Resource

name.description: Name is the metadata.name field of a Resource

namespace.description: Namespace is the metadata.namespace field of a Resource

OriginType.title: OriginType defines the type of origin for a package.

PackageInfo.description:
These fields are not consumed by any functionality in kpt and are simply passed through.
Note that like any other KRM resource, humans and automation can also use `metadata.labels` and
`metadata.annotations` as the extension mechanism.
PackageInfo.title: PackageInfo contains optional information about the package such as license, documentation, etc.

description.description: Description contains a short description of the package.

emails.description: Email is the list of emails for the package authors.

keywords.description: Keywords is a list of keywords for this package.

licenseFile.description: Relative slash-delimited path to the license file (e.g. LICENSE.txt)

man.description: Man is the path to documentation about the package

site.description: Site is the URL for package web page.

Pipeline.title: Pipeline declares a pipeline of functions used to mutate or validate resources.

mutators.description: Mutators defines a list of of KRM functions that mutate resources.

validators.description:
Validators defines a list of KRM functions that validate resources.
Validators are not permitted to mutate resources.

ResourceMeta.title: ResourceMeta contains the metadata for a both Resource Type and Resource.

annotations.description: Annotations is the metadata.annotations field of a Resource.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion is the apiVersion field of a Resource

kind.description: Kind is the kind field of a Resource

labels.description: Labels is the metadata.labels field of a Resource

name.description: Name is the metadata.name field of a Resource

namespace.description: Namespace is the metadata.namespace field of a Resource

Selector.description:
Selector specifies the selection criteria
please update IsEmpty method if more properties are added

TypeMeta.description:
TypeMeta partially copies apimachinery/pkg/apis/meta/v1.TypeMeta
No need for a direct dependence; the fields are stable.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion is the apiVersion field of a Resource

kind.description: Kind is the kind field of a Resource

UpdateStrategyType.title: UpdateStrategyType defines the strategy for updating a package from upstream.

Upstream.title: Upstream is a user-specified upstream locator for a package.

UpstreamLock.title: UpstreamLock is a resolved locator for the last fetch of the package.

kptfile.title: KptFile contains information about a package managed with kpt.

annotations.description: Annotations is the metadata.annotations field of a Resource.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion is the apiVersion field of a Resource

kind.description: Kind is the kind field of a Resource

labels.description: Labels is the metadata.labels field of a Resource

name.description: Name is the metadata.name field of a Resource

namespace.description: Namespace is the metadata.namespace field of a Resource
